metadata.Title: CVE-2011-4361 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
MediaWiki before 1.17.1 does not check for read permission before handling action=ajax requests, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by (1) leveraging the SpecialUpload::ajaxGetExistsWarning function, or by (2) leveraging an extension, as demonstrated by the CategoryTree, ExtTab, and InlineEditor extensions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-4361` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.2-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.2-1').
